title: When people realized that Riot was starting to wage war on damage creep.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/cba2841e06b02ebc560dd59da6d5d767.gif

Fucking love you guys at riot right now.

replies.body: Nerfing minion damage will only make bots stronger.

How long until 

omg peepel two tankee naow

I give it five minutes before marksman mains complain

Five hours for assassins

Five days for skirmishers,

an everyone else is just going to laugh and laugh.
